job_history.work_description: Automated repeatable tasks where possible to increase efficiency. Consistently received a 100% rate of customer satisfaction. Performed root cause analysis to identify system errors and improve accuracy by 15%. Awarded with the Tech of the quarter for contributions to mission.

Obtained all mission related certification required for the application services provider, within the 24x7 technical support tier. Trained current and new team members on existing and new application services procedure and Commercial off the Shelf (COTS) software.
Coordinated all NEAS weekly brown-bag seminar for the VA-95 Technical Resource Center. Formatted and delivered training specific to the intended party and purpose for company standards.

skills.name: Automation
skills.explanation: Automated repeatable tasks to increase efficiency, indicating strong proficiency in automation.

skills.name: Troubleshooting
skills.explanation: Performed root cause analysis to identify system errors and improve accuracy, showing strong proficiency in troubleshooting.

skills.explanation: Consistently received a 100% rate of customer satisfaction, indicating strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.explanation: Trained current and new team members on existing and new application services procedure, showing a solid working proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Trained team members on existing and new application services procedure, and delivered training specific to the intended party and purpose, indicating strong proficiency in training and development.

skills.name: Technical Support
skills.explanation: Worked in the 24x7 technical support tier, suggesting strong proficiency in technical support.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
